items.title: SUMFORU: An LLM-Based Review Summarization Framework for Personalized Purchase Decision Support
items.summary_en: Online product reviews contain rich but noisy signals that overwhelm users and hinder effective decision-making. Existing LLM-based summarizers remain generic and fail to account for individual preferences, limiting their practical utility. We propose SUMFORU, a steerable review summarization framework that aligns outputs with explicit user personas to support personalized purchase decisions.
